attributes.title: This is the worst lasagna I’ve ever had 🤮🤢🙄
attributes.review: Honestly I came across this very hungry so I was like what harm can it do, and so there was my very first mistake as I came to learn that it could do a lot of harm. This lasagna came with an orange with a yellow toupee and it was honestly very disgusting. It made go mad and gave my family diarrhea 😔😪. This is unforgivable and this should be removed from the market. 😾

So i downloaded this app. Not because i wanted to see what trump was doing but because i knew it was going to be bad. Well i was RIGHT! 
So now that i have seen the app i thought i would realistically advertise it.
IF YOU WANT A WALKING, TALKING ORANGE WHO LOVES TO INJECT BLEACH INTO HIS SKIN AND THAT SPITS POOP EVERY TIME HE TALKS THEN DOWNLOAD THIS APP AND VOTE FOR OLD MC’ORANGE TRUMP. 
❤️❤️🤩💩💩💩🍊🍊🍊🍊🎀✨✨
I don’t recommend a poop spitting orange as president though. It would get very smelly and the orange does not have a brain.
Now about the app. This app is like an annoying little sibling. It constantly ask for me to vote. It asks me so much that my phone crashes every two seconds. If my phone crashes all the time how am i supposed to scroll on TikTok for hours. Then it started asking for my location. Why does the orange want my location. I gave it my location and then i got a package. I got a piece of paper with poop all over it. He probably wanted to say something like vote trump but forgot that he spits poop. I deleted the app. Obviously. Then i went to bed. I couldn’t sleep. All i could see was oranges and poop. The app haunts your dreams. THE ORANGE TOLD ME TO DOWNLOAD IT OR I WILL DIE! PIGS STARTED JUMPING ALL OVER ME CHANTING: download and vote! SO I BEG YOU! IF YOU LIKE TO SLEEP AND DONT WAS TO DIE, DO NOT EVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP BECAUSE IT WILL HAUNT YOU FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE! 😘😘😘🍊🍊❤️❤️✨✨😁😁💩
Ps: i gave it one star. No surprises there.

attributes.title: delete
